amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 as printed in the Congressional Record to provide funds to be used as payment of claims by families who were affected by the accident involving a United States Marine Corps EA-6B aircraft on February 3, 1998, near Cavalese, Italy.

action.text: Mr. Young (FL) raised a point of order against the Burton amendment (A006). Mr. Young stated that the amendment sought to change existing law by constituting legislation in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
